RecordAlert.name: RecordAlert
RecordAlert.description: Represents an alert message about a specific record and tracks the status and active period of the alert.

Description.description: A detailed description of the alert.

EffectiveDate.description: The date and time that the alert was generated or became active.

IsActive.description: Whether the alert is still active (true) or has been dismissed (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record alert.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record alert.

ParentId.description: The user, account, or contact associated with the alert.

Severity.description: The severity of the alert, which can be pulled from the Record Alert Category or overridden.

SnoozeUntilDate.description: The date the alert is delivered.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the alert in an external system.

Subject.description: A short description of the alert.

ValidUntilDate.description: The date and time when the alert becomes invalid.

WhatId.description: The record that the alert pertains to.
